items.sentence: Do you remember what song it was that Tom sang at our wedding?

As we ate our meal, we talked about what we had done that day.
Bus drivers are responsible for cleaning the buses they drive.
Thank you for giving me something to eat. I was really hungry.
The most important thing is the ability to think for yourself.
The police are looking into the cause of the traffic accident.
The police officers took the man who was yelling into custody.
The bread I bought at the supermarket didn\'t taste very good.
The ship that Tom\'s grandfather was on was sunk by a torpedo.
